meanings.definition: The act of reporting news or information.
meanings.sent1: Her reportages on the local events were always informative.
meanings.sent2: The journalist's reportages were published in the newspaper.
meanings.sent3: The reportages about the missing cat turned out to be a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: His reportages painted a vivid picture of the bustling city life.
meanings.sent5: The reportages from the war zone were both heartbreaking and eye-opening.

meanings.definition: A collection of reports or news articles.
meanings.sent1: The library had a vast collection of reportages from different eras.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading reportages from various journalists.
meanings.sent3: The reportages in the old archive were a treasure trove of information.
meanings.sent4: His bookshelf was filled with reportages from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The reportages in the magazine covered a wide range of topics.
